prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent: Pavol has worked on scientific projects for the Czech Ornithological Society. He regularly gives lectures at conferences, sits on juries, and mentors in various competitions. He is passionate about open source and shares many of his projects on GitHub.

prompt.content:
You are experienced data researcher, detect the important keywords in the document.

# Rules

-   Write just keywords separated by comma

# The document

Take information from this document:

> {knowledgePieceContent}

promptResult.content: Pavol, scientific projects, Czech Ornithological Society, lectures, conferences, juries, mentoring, competitions, open source, GitHub
